t_password_leave_empty: Leave it empty if you don't want to change it
t_fill_form_to_create_deal: Fill the form below to create a new deal
t_drag_deal_images: Drag or click to add images
t_enter_telegram_signature: This will be assigned in the footer of message (optional)
t_fill_form_create_shop: Fill the form below to create a new shop
t_adsense_paragraph: Add your Google Adsense ads over the website or any other advertising company
t_create_article_paragraph: Your place to create a blog section
t_edit_article_paragraph: Update article title, cover or content
t_create_category_paragraph: You can create unlimited categories or sub categories
t_user_not_seen_message: User has not seen this message yet
t_create_package_deals_para: Fill package details below and start earning money from deals subscriptions
t_create_field_para: Extend your website usage by adding custom fields
t_field_options_hint: Separate options with commas and no spaces (e.g option1,option2,option3,...)
t_create_city_para: Create a new city if does not exists in default records
t_create_country_para: Create a new country if does not exists in default records
t_create_state_para: Create a new state if does not exists in default records
t_maintenance_mode_para: Set your entire website as maintenance mode
t_maintenance_mode_warning: If you cannot access your website again, please copy and save the link below, so you can disable maintenance again.
t_enter_maintenance_disable_token: Save this token, if you cannot login to dashboard in future
t_create_page_para: Filling the form below to create custom pages or links
t_edit_page_para: Filling the form below to edit this page
t_create_package_para: Fill package details below and start earning money from users subscriptions
t_edit_plan_para: Edit this package and make changes
t_roles_delete_change: Please select below the default role for users that have this role
t_enter_default_new_role: Choose default role for current users
t_create_owner_role_para: Owners have access to everything. However, you can limit their access to some sensitive sections
t_create_admin_role_para: Select below permissions for administrator role
t_create_moderator_role_para: Select below permissions for moderator role
t_create_member_role_para: Select below permissions for member role
t_nexmo_gateway_para: APIs for SMS, Voice and Phone Verifications
t_enter_max_login_attempts: Enter max login attempts before lock login
t_username_or_email_or_phone: Username or e-mail address or phone number
t_geo_settings_para: You can use your website only in your country or make it global
t_payment_gateways_settings_para: Enable or disable a payment gateway
t_posting_settings_para: Change default posting for free accounts
t_security_settings_para: Here you can make your website more secure
t_enter_blacklist_username: Blocked usernames list (Use a comma to separate usernames)
t_enter_blacklist_words: Blocked words list (Use a comma to separate words)
t_enter_blacklist_emails: Blocked emails list (Use a comma to separate emails)
t_seo_settings_para: Design your Website for SEO and get more traffic
t_smtp_settings_para: Config an SMTP server to send emails and notifications
t_social_settings_para: Implement Social Login and increase your registration
t_watermark_settings_para: Add a watermark logo to deals pictures
t_choose_default_owner: Choose the owner of this shop
t_enter_renew_days: Enter number of days for this renew
t_support_confirm_extra_para: Please use this option only if you need urgent help
t_contact_mendelmangroup_para: Thank you for contacting us. We always respond quickly within minutes, but sometimes it may takes up to a day. You must have a valid license key to get support. Your purchase code, your envato username and your website domain will be attached to this email. Have a wonderful day.
t_support_enter_message: Type your message here and make sure to give a more details
t_support_settings_para: Here you can change your support settings
t_choose_default_theme_para: You can also contact us directly, and request your own theme
t_enter_additional_details: Describe how do you want this theme (colors, fonts, positions...). Write as much as possible details
t_private_theme: Private theme (No one will have the same theme)
t_request_theme_para1: Want a custom theme for EVEREST? contact us an will help you.
t_request_theme_para2: Remember, that your purchase code and your Envato username will be attached to this email. Make sure you have a valid license.
t_fill_to_create_user: Fill the form below to create a new user account
t_edit_user_para: Fill the form below to update user account
t_search_no_results: There is nothing to show here. Please enter your search keyword above to see deals
t_create_account_para: Fill the form below to create an account
t_register_disabled_para: Unfortunately we have disabled creating new account right now. Please try again later or sign in using social media links.
t_password_reset_para: Enter your e-mail address to reset your password
t_2fa_verification_para: Two factor authentication (2FA) strengthens access security by requiring two methods (also referred to as factors) to verify your identity. Two factor authentication protects against phishing, social engineering and password brute force attacks and secures your logins from attackers exploiting weak or stolen credentials.
t_scan_this_qrcode: Scan this QRCode with your Authenticator App
t_2fa_currently_enabled: 2FA is currently Enabled for your account
t_2fa_disable_para: If you are looking to disable Two Factor Authentication. Please confirm your password and click disable 2FA button
t_leave_pass_empty: Leave it empty if you dont want to change it
t_no_deals_right_now: Oops! There is no deals to show right now. Please check again later
t_sorry_page_not_found: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found
t_login_to_comment: You need to sign in or sign up to post comments
t_no_comment_now: Oops! There is no comment to show right now. Please check again or be the first to comment
t_spam_comments_will_remove: spam and offensive comments will be removed
t_select_chat_to_start: Select a conversation to start chatting
t_sorry_maintenance_mode: Sorry site is down for maintenance right now
t_welcome_para_install:
First of all, Thank you so much for purchasing EVEREST and for being one of our loyal customers. You are awesome! And a big thanks for everyone that was waiting for this great upgrade.
You are entitled to get free lifetime updates to this product with exceptional support from the author directly.
Please choose below your prefered language, for other languages they will be available in next updates, So please wait.
t_serv_req_php_true: Congratulations! You have php {php} to run EVEREST Script
t_serv_req_php_false: Oops! You need PHP 7.2.0 or greater to run EVEREST
t_serv_req_bcmath_true: Congratulations! BCMath extension is installed and loaded
t_serv_req_bcmath_false: Oops! You need to enable BCMath exntension on your server
t_serv_req_ctype_true: Congratulations! Ctype extension is installed and loaded
t_serv_req_ctype_false: Oops! You need to enable Ctype exntension on your server
t_serv_req_json_true: Congratulations! Json extension is installed and loaded
t_serv_req_json_false: Oops! You need to enable Json exntension on your server
t_serv_req_mbstring_true: Congratulations! Mbstring extension is installed and loaded
t_serv_req_mbstring_false: Oops! You need to enable Mbstring exntension on your server
t_serv_req_openssl_true: Congratulations! OpenSSL extension is installed and loaded
t_serv_req_openssl_false: Oops! You need to enable OpenSSL exntension on your server
t_serv_req_pdo_true: Congratulations! PDO extension is installed and loaded
t_serv_req_pdo_false: Oops! You need to enable PDO exntension on your server
t_serv_req_tokenizer_true: Congratulations! Tokenizer extension is installed and loaded
t_serv_req_tokenizer_false: Oops! You need to enable Tokenizer exntension on your server
t_serv_req_xml_true: Congratulations! XML extension is installed and loaded
t_serv_req_xml_false: Oops! You need to enable Tokenizer exntension on your server
t_finish_installation_para:
Your website is now ready. Thank you so much for using EVEREST.
Please clickFinish installation button below to complete the installation operation.
You can access administrator or moderator dashboard below.
We are available to assist you with any issue, suggestion or bug, you can choose below any method to contact us (Facebook, Tawk chat, email address, Codecanyon), and we will be there quickly to assist you. Enjoy!
t_cookie_message: This website uses cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website.
t_do_have_something: Do you have something to sell?
t_do_have_something_para: Sell all you want for free on our platform
